attributes.action: ensure the midlands and north of the country have an integrated transport facility
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Instead of expanding the airports in the south and encouraging airlines to the so-called hubs invest in an integrated transport facility that encourages people to use local facilities ie local airports and trains. Current plans are forcing most people to travel south to use airlines, why not stop the future development of Heathrow and instead invest in the regions thus reducing peoples carbon footprint by reducing travel down south.
